title: Privacy Parrot
description: A tool that analyzes privacy policies with artificial intelligence to determine if a site can share your personal information.

cards.title: Landing Page
cards.description: The mascot, the title, the value proposition, and the main action of the site are all front and center. Every section of the site can be found clearly and unobtrusively.

cards.title: Popular Policies
cards.description: The list of most frequently visited policy pages. The results for a search query that matches multiple policies also uses this format. Search and navigationare now at the top of the site with a diminished focus, but are still easy to find.

cards.title: Policy Page
cards.description: Displays the classification information for the requested site. The classification is most prominent, but links to the site, its privacy policy, and a correction form are easily available.
